content: for the past 20 years big knit supporters have knitted and donated millions of little woolly hats for innocent smoothies with money from every bottle sold going towards supporting older people during the cold winter months knitters from across the land are sending their hats until 1st july this year they will be put onto bottles and sent out to stores the smoothies with their hats are available to buy in stores across the country in october and for every hatted bottle sold 25p is donated to age uk this is such a great way to use up small leftover amounts of yarn have fun **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
